title: On-Site Management, Newly Renovated Interiors, Fireplace*
posting_body: This is a 1 Bedroom, 1 Bath, approximately 834 Sq.

Located in the scenic enclave of Lowry, an upscale neighborhood known for its open spaces and a thriving town center, The Ridge at Lowry delivers immediate access to the best that Denver, CO has to offer.
Our newly-renovated apartment homes stylishly blend work and play with expansive floor plans and high-end finishes, while a luxury-grade amenity package provides all the necessities for entertaining.
Discover life at The Ridge at Lowry.

9-Foot and Vaulted Ceilings with Crown Molding, Fully-Equipped Kitchens, Built-in Desks and Bookshelves, Oversized Walk-In Closets, Detached Garages and Carports*, USB Charging Dock in Kitchen*, Complete Stainless Steel GE® Appliances*, Fireplace*, Custom Espresso-Finished Cabinets*, Personal Balconies and Patios, Ceiling Fans and LED Lighting*, Full-Size Washers and Dryers Included, Energy-Efficient Windows, Newly Renovated Interiors, Open-Concept Living Areas, Quartz Countertops*, Tile Backsplashes*, Wood-style Vinyl Plank Flooring

Wi-Fi in Common Areas, On-Site Management, Controlled Access Community, Onsite Recycling Program, Access to Bike Trails, Endless Shopping, Recreation and Entertainment Minutes Away, Valet Trash Removal, Media Room, Resort-Inspired Pool and Spa with Sundeck, Online Payments Available, Upgraded 24-Hour Fitness Center, Close Proximity to Lowry Town Center, Yoga Room, Dog Park with Agility Equipment – We Love Pets!, Easy Access to Downtown Denver
1 Pet: Deposit is $150 and Pet fee is $150
2 Pets: Deposit is $250 and Pet fee is $250
